title: Back to Back Stemplots: Big Brain Test
question_text:
Students at East Texas High School take the Big Brains Test during senior year. While classroom X is a typical classroom, classroom Y has an unusual student named Albert. Which of the following statements is true?
Stem
Classroom X (1)(10)Classroom Y (1)

-131
Key: 4|7 = 47.

choices.text: Class Y has a greater standard deviation.
Class Y has a greater range.
Class Y has a greater variance.
Class Y has a greater median.
Class Y has a greater mean.
